titleStmt.title: A crovvne for a conquerour; and Too late to call backe yesterday. Two poems, the one divine and the other morall. / By R.D.
titleStmt.author: Davenport, Robert, fl. 1623.
Purslowe, Elizabeth, printer.
Constable, Francis, d. 1647, bookseller.
Davenport, Robert, fl. 1623. Too late to call backe yesterday.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.P. for Francis Constable, and are to be sold at his shop, under Saint Martins Church,

notesStmt.note: "Too late to call backe yesterday" has a separate t.p. but continuous pagination and continuous signatures.
Imperfect: cropped, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop, under Saint Martins Church
